rules.text: If your Army Faction is Tyranids, while a Tyranids unit from your army is within 6" of one or more Synapse models from your army, that unit is said to be within Synapse Range of your army. Each time a Tyranids unit from your army takes a Battle-shock test, if it is within Synapse Range of your army, take that test on 3D6 instead of 2D6.

If your Army Faction is Tyranids, once per battle, in either player’s Command phase, if one or more units from your army with this ability are on the battlefield, you can unleash the Shadow in the Warp. When you do, each enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test.
At the start of the first battle round, select one of the following Hyper-adaptations to be active for Tyranids units from your army until the end of the battle:

rules.title: SWARMING INSTINCTS
rules.text: Each time a Tyranids model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets an enemy Infantry or Swarm unit, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

rules.title: HYPER-AGGRESSION
rules.text: Each time a Tyranids model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets an enemy Monster or Vehicle unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

rules.title: HIVE PREDATORS
rules.text: Each time a Tyranids model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets an enemy Character unit, if a Critical Hit is scored, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.

rules.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
rules.target: One Tyranids unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

rules.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
rules.target: One Tyranids unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

rules.target: Up to two Tyranids units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army and are eligible to fight, or one other Tyranids unit from your army that is eligible to fight.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those selected units makes an attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

rules.when: Fight phase, just before a Tyranids unit from your army Consolidates.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit can end its Consolidation move in Unit Coherency and within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, instead of making that Consolidation move, it can instead make a Normal move of up to 6".

rules.target: Up to two Tyranids units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other Tyranids unit from your army.
rules.effect: Select one Hyper-adaptation. Until the end of the battle round, that hyper-adaptation is active for those selected units in addition to any other that may be active for your army.
rules.restrictions: You cannot select the same hyper-adaptation you selected at the start of the first battle round.

rules.target: Up to two Endless Multitude units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other Endless Multitude unit from your army.
rules.effect: Up to D3+3 destroyed models are returned to each of the selected units.

rules.text: Tyranids model only. After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three Tyranids units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.
Tyranids model only. Once per turn, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll, one Damage roll, one Advance roll, one Charge roll or one saving throw made for the bearer.
Tyranids model only. While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 9" of the bearer, that unit is within Synapse Range of your army.

Tyranids model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. At the start of any turn, if the bearer has fewer than its starting number of wounds remaining, until the end of the battle, it has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

values.title: Will of the Hive Mind
values.text: Once per turn, one friendly Tyranids unit within 12" of one or more models with this ability can be targeted with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if another unit from your army has already been targeted with that Stratagem this phase.

values.title: Paroxysm (Psychic)
values.text: At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to this model and roll one D6: on a 1, this Psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit.

list: This model’s monstrous bonesword and lash whip can be replaced with one of the following

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: monstrous bonesword and lash whip; Tyrant talons.

values.title: Will of the Hive Mind
values.text: Once per turn, one friendly Tyranids unit within 12" of one or more models with this ability can be targeted with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if another unit from your army has already been targeted with that Stratagem this phase.

values.title: Onslaught (Aura, Psychic)
values.text: While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

list: This model’s monstrous bonesword and lash whip can be replaced with one of the following
This model’s monstrous scything talons can be replaced with one of the following

values.text: * This model cannot be equipped with both a stranglethorn cannon and a heavy venom cannon. This model cannot be equipped with more than 1 heavy venom cannon, and it cannot be equipped with more than 1 stranglethorn cannon.

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: monstrous bonesword and lash whip; monstrous scything talons.
This model can be attached to the following unit

values.title: Hive Commander
values.text: At the start of your Command phase, if this model is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP.

values.title: Malign Presence
values.text: Once per battle, after your opponent uses a Stratagem, if this model is your Warlord and is on the battlefield, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the battle, increase that Stratagem's cost to your opponent by 1CP.

values.title: Domination of the Hive Mind
values.text: While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 9" of this model, that unit is within your army's Synapse Range.
This model can be attached to the following unit

melee.name: Broodlord claws and talons [DEVASTATING WOUNDS, TWIN-LINKED]

values.title: Vicious Insight
values.text: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

values.title: Hypnotic Gaze (Psychic)
values.text: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
This model can be attached to the following unit

values.title: Alpha Warrior
values.text: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

values.title: Death Blow
values.text: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
This model can be attached to the following units

values.title: Spawn Termagants
values.text: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly Termagants unit within 6" of this model and return up to D3+3 destroyed Termagant models to that unit. A Termagants unit cannot be selected for this ability more than once per phase.

values.title: Brood Progenitor (Aura, Psychic)
values.text: While a friendly Termagants unit is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

footnotes.footnotes: Before selecting targets for this weapon, select one of its profiles to make attacks with.

list: This model’s massive scything talons can be replaced with 1 massive crushing claws.

melee.name: ➡ Old One Eye’s claws and talons - strike
➡ Old One Eye’s claws and talons - sweep

values.title: Alpha Leader
values.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

values.title: Unstoppable Monster
values.text: At the start of each player's Command phase, this model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

footnotes.footnotes: Before selecting targets for this weapon, select one of its profiles to make attacks with.

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: Old One Eye’s claws and talons.
This model can be attached to the following units

values.title: Adaptable Predators
values.text: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

list: Any number of models can each have their devourer replaced with one of the following
For every 3 models in this unit, 1 model’s devourer can be replaced with 1 barbed strangler.
For every 3 models in this unit, 1 model’s devourer can be replaced with 1 venom cannon.

values.title: Adrenalised Onslaught
values.text: At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one of the following abilities to apply to models in this unit until the end of the phase:

list.title: Aggression Imperative
list.text: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

list.title: Preservation Imperative
list.text: Each time a saving throw is made for a model in this unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

values.title: Skulking Horrors
values.text: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: All models in this unit can each have their fleshborer replaced with 1 Termagant devourer.
All models in this unit can each have their fleshborer replaced with 1 Termagant spinefists.

values.title: Bounding Leap
values.text: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

values.title: Winged Swarm
values.text: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

values.title: Grasping Tendrils
values.text: Each time an enemy unit (excluding Titanic units) within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army with this ability is selected to Fall Back, you can roll one D6: on a 3+, that enemy unit must Remain Stationary instead.

values.title: Hypertoxic Miasma (Aura)
values.text: At the end of your Movement phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of this model: on a 2-3, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 4-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

melee.name: Bone cleaver, lash whip and rending claws [TWIN-LINKED]

values.title: Guardian Organism
values.text: While a Character model is leading this unit, that Character has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

list: Any number of models can each have their scything talons and rending claws replaced with one of the following
1 bone cleaver, lash whip and rending claws

values.title: Node Lash (Psychic)
values.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the target is Battle-shocked, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

values.title: Psychic Terror (Psychic)
values.text: If one or more Neurotyrants from your army are on the battlefield when you unleash the Shadow in the Warp, subtract 1 from the Battle-shock test each enemy unit on the battlefield must take as a result.

values.title: Synaptic Relays
values.text: In your Command phase, you can select up to two friendly Tyranids units within 12" of this model's unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, the selected units are always considered to be within Synapse Range of your army.

values.title: Designer's Note
values.text: Place a Synaptic Relay token next to each selected unit to remind you.

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: psychic scream; Neurotyrant claws and lashes.
This model can be attached to the following units

values.title: CORE
values.text: Fights First, Infiltrators, Lone Operative, Stealth

values.title: Feeder Tendrils
values.text: Each time this model destroys an enemy Character model, you gain 1CP.

values.title: Pheromone Trail
values.text: Once per battle round, you can target one model with this ability with the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP.

values.title: CORE
values.text: Fights First, Infiltrators, Lone Operative, Stealth

values.title: Feeder Tendrils
values.text: Each time this model destroys an enemy Character model, you gain 1CP.

values.title: Fear of the Unseen (Aura)
values.text: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1. In addition, in the Battle-shock step of your opponent's Command phase, if such an enemy unit is below its Starting Strength, it must take a Battle-shock test.
This model cannot be your Warlord.

values.title: Encephalic Diffusion (Aura, Psychic)
values.text: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and, if that enemy unit is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from the Wound roll as well.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

footnotes.footnotes: Before selecting targets for this weapon, select one of its profiles to make attacks with.

values.title: Burning Spray
values.text: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

values.title: Grisly Spectacle
values.text: Each time this model is selected to fight, after resolving its attacks, if one or more enemy units were destroyed by those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: grasping tongue; ravenous maw; shovelling claws.

values.title: Foul Spores (Aura)
values.text: While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 6" of this unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack. In addition, while a friendly Tyranids unit (excluding Monsters ) is within 6" of this unit, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.

values.title: Pouncing Leap
values.text: You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.

values.title: Neurocytes
values.text: While this unit is within Synapse Range of your army, it has the Synapse keyword.
* This unit can only contain 2 Neurogaunt Nodebeasts if it contains 20 Neurogaunts.

ranged.name: ➡ Warp Blast - focused witchfire [LETHAL HITS, PSYCHIC]

values.title: FACTION
values.text: Shadow in the Warp, Synapse Spirit Leech (Aura, Psychic): While this unit contains a Neurothrope, while an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test, it suffers D3 mortal wounds and one model in this unit regains up to D3 lost wounds.

values.title: Warp Field (Aura, Psychic)
values.text: While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 6" of this unit, models in that unit have a 6+ invulnerable save.

footnotes.footnotes: Before selecting targets for this weapon, select one of its profiles to make attacks with.

values.title: Every model is equipped with
values.text: Warp Blast; xenos claws and teeth.

values.title: Vanguard Predator
values.text: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

values.title: Death From Below
values.text: At the end of your opponent's turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

list: Any number of models can each be equipped with 1 thoracic bio-weapon.

values.title: Chitinous Horrors (Aura)
values.text: While an enemy unit is within Engagement Range of this unit, halve the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy unit.

list: All models in this unit can each be equipped with 1 spinemaws.

values.title: Parasitic Infection
values.text: Each time an Infantry model is destroyed by an attack made with this model's barbed ovipositor, after this model has finished making its attacks, you can add one new Ripper Swarms unit to your army consisting of D3 models and set it up within 3" of this model. If you do, that Ripper Swarms unit can be set up within Engagement Range of the destroyed model's unit (but not within Engagement Range of any other enemy units).

values.title: It Itches!
values.text: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

melee.name: Distensible jaw [ANTI-INFANTRY 4+, DEVASTATING WOUNDS, EXTRA ATTACKS]

values.title: Terror From The Deep
values.text: Each time this unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 12" of this model: on a 2-4, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 5+, that unit suffers 3 mortal wounds and must take a Battle-shock test.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

values.title: Subterranean Tunnels
values.text: Each time this model is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy units. When doing so, if this model is set up within 9" of one or more enemy units, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

values.title: Bio-minefield
values.text: Enemy units cannot start or end an Advance move within 6" of this unit.

values.title: Floating Death
values.text: Each time an enemy unit ends a move within 3" of a model in this unit, and each time a model in this unit ends a move within 3" of an enemy unit, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. The model in this unit that caused that roll is then destroyed.

values.title: Bio-minefield
values.text: Enemy units cannot start or end an Advance move within 6" of this unit.

values.title: Floating Death
values.text: Each time an enemy unit ends a move within 3" of a model in this unit, and each time a model in this unit ends a move within 3" of an enemy unit, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. The model in this unit that caused that roll is then destroyed.

values.title: Symbiotic Targeting
values.text: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly Tyranids model makes an attack that targets that unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

ranged.name: Spore Mine launcher [BLAST, DEVASTATING WOUNDS, HEAVY, INDIRECT FIRE]

values.title: Seed Spore Mines
values.text: In your Shooting phase, each time this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability instead of making any attacks with its ranged weapons. If it does, you can add a new Spore Mines unit to your army and set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is within 48" of this unit but more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units. That Spore Mines unit contains 1 model for each model in this unit.

values.title: Blistering Assault
values.text: Each time an enemy unit is selected to shoot, after that unit has shot, if any models from this unit lost one or more wounds as a result of those attacks, this unit can make a Blistering Assault move. To do so, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result each model in this unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but this unit must finish that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. Each unit can only make one Blistering Assault move per phase.

list: Any number of models can each have their Carnifex extra scything talons replaced with one of
Any number of models can each have their Carnifex scything talons replaced with one of
Any number of models can each be equipped with 1 bio-plasma.
Any number of models can each be equipped with 1 spine banks.

values.title: Every model is equipped with
values.text: Carnifex scything talons; Carnifex extra scything talons; xenos claws and teeth.

values.title: Death Scream
values.text: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

values.title: Defensive Stance
values.text: Each time you target this unit with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, while resolving that Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+, or unmodified Hit rolls of 4+ instead if this unit is within range of an objective marker.

wargear.title: WARGEAR OPTIONS
values: Any number of models can each have their shockcannon replaced with 1 impaler cannon.

values.title: Resilient Organism
values.text: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.
While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

list: This model’s fleshborer hive can be replaced with one of the following

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: fleshborer hive; stinger salvoes; powerful limbs.

values.title: Aerial Seeding
values.text: This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model must immediately disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models. After this model has been set up on the battlefield, no units can embark within it.

This model has a transport capacity of 20 Tyranids Infantry models, or 1 Tyranids Monster model with a Wounds characteristic of 12 or less. Each Infantry model with a Wounds characteristic of more than 1 takes up the space of 3 models.

values.title: Airborne Predator
values.text: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly , add 1 to the Hit roll.
While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: drool cannon; stinger salvoes; tentaclids; scything wings; thorax spur.

values.title: Spore Mine Cysts
values.text: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can do one of the following:

list.text: Select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
Add a new Spore Mines unit containing D3 models to your army and set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is within 6" of this model and more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units.

values.text: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

list: This model’s twin stranglethorn cannon can be replaced with 1 twin heavy venom cannon.

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: stinger salvoes; twin stranglethorn cannon; scything wings.

ranged.name: Hive Defences
ranged.text: Each time an enemy unit is set up or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within range of this weapon, if that enemy unit is an eligible target, the bearer can shoot with this weapon at that unit as if it were your Shooting phase (the bearer can do so up to four times per phase).

values.title: Seed Mucolids
values.text: In your Shooting phase, each time this model is selected to shoot, it can use this ability instead of making any attacks with its ranged weapons. If it does, you can add a new Mucolid Spores unit containing 1 model to your army and set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is within 18" of this model but more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy units.

melee.name: Talons and betentacled maw [ANTI-PSYKER 2+, DEVASTATING WOUNDS]

values.title: Bio-stimulus (Aura)
values.text: While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

values.title: Feeding Frenzy
values.text: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that target is also Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

values.title: This model is equipped with
values.text: psychoclastic torrent; talons and betentacled maw.

values.title: Disruption Bombardment
values.text: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if an enemy Infantry unit was hit by one or more of those attacks made by this unit's bio-cannons, until the end of your opponent's next turn, that enemy unit is disrupted. While a unit is disrupted, subtract 2 from its Move characteristic, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.
